articles.headline: The Philippines Declares Dengue Epidemic As Deaths Surge To 622 Since January
articles.content:
The Philippines declared the country's outbreak of dengue to be a national epidemic on Tuesday as the flare-up of the mosquito-borne disease has caused 622 deaths since January.
The Philippines Department of Health said it had recorded 146,062 cases of dengu… [+3205 chars]
